name: Sentinel 4: Dark Star
description: Want a tactical and strategic tower defense challenge that's packed with options and upgrades? Take command of the dropship Sentinel and do battle across a vibrant sci-fi world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/XP Processor: 1.2GHZ+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible. ATI, NVIDIA or Intel HD. Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Great IOS port, one of my favorite TD games ever

Probably one of the best SF tower defense games I have played: A lot of upgrades available through money earned in missions, good selection of different commanders to use; unique turrets to play with, allowing you to try out different strategies. An excellent upgrade to Sentinel 3 in every way, as well as more leveling and upgrade or choice options compared to games like Defense Grid or Sole Survivor.

On win7 I can only save if I use 'Run as Administrator'. Even then, it loads up missing several levels I've completed. Offline mode won't save at all. At level 25 it locks up every time I've tried it. I'd rate this game a 4 of 5 star, but with this save and lockup issue it get's a 1.
